    • setAssistantsPlayed

      public void setAssistantsPlayed(Assistant assistant)

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int id)
      play an assistant card if the chosen card is valid. Update the lists assistantPlayed and turnPlayer.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the assistant to play (1 <= id <= 10)
      Returns:
      true if the assistant was played successfully

    • checkValidAssistant

      public boolean checkValidAssistant(int id)
      check if a played card is Valid
      Parameters:
      id - (1 <= id <= 10)
      Returns:
      false if card is not present in Wizard true if Current Player's cards are all equal to already played cards false if Current Player has at least one different card from already played card but He played a card equal to an already played card.

    • getAssistant

      private Assistant getAssistant(int id)
      Parameters:
      id - (1 <= id <= 10)
      Returns:
      Assistant corresponding with chosen id set error state otherwise

    • isPlayed

      private boolean isPlayed(Assistant assistant)
      Checks if the card was played in this turn already
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistant to check
      Returns:
      true if and only if played card is equal to at least one card of already played cards

    • allEquals

      private boolean allEquals()
      Returns:
      true if and only if the last Current Player's cards are equal to already played cards

    • clearAssistantsPlayed

      public void clearAssistantsPlayed()
      Clears the assistants played on the last turn
